title: Making Moves & Sex in the News with Menace

description:
On today’s show, Emily is reunited with radio personality, friend, & former co-host Menace, & they’re going over some current Sex In The News. Plus, they’re answering your emails.

They chat about the most annoying parts of sex that no one likes to talk about but most of us have been through, how Siri & other smart devices may be listening in on our sexual encounters, & what to do when your partner is hung up on your past.


Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com

For more info on Menace, click HERE. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
